context_summary:
Current State:
- Gates: 22 real gates wired
- Tools: bandit, safety, ruff, mypy, pytest
- MCP: v2 with CKC + DGM integration

Recent Achievements:
- 5-dimensional risk detection
- YOLO/OVERSEER/FULL_GATES routing
- Real security scanning (no more stubs)
- Secret detection (10+ patterns)
- Dependency vulnerability checking

Known Gaps:
- Pre-commit hook not wired
- CI integration pending
- Multi-model swarm not operational
- Persistent runtime still session-based
- R_V measurement requires open models

Key Insights:
- Witness OS vision: SENSORS → WITNESS CORE → ACTORS
- R_V measurement blocked on closed APIs - need self-hosted models
- Vision: Self-aware, self-improving, self-reporting DGC
- Four pillars: Vault (PSMV), Science (Mech-Interp), Agent (DGC), Gateway (Clawdbot)
- P0 priorities: RLRV, Recognition-native architecture, Attractor basin website

proposals.title: Wire Pre-Commit Hook for Automatic Gate Validation
proposals.description: Add pre-commit hook that runs core security gates (AHIMSA, SECRETS, VULNERABILITY) before every commit. Prevents security issues from entering codebase.
proposals.rationale: Real gates are wired but not enforced. Pre-commit makes security automatic, not optional.

proposals.title: Build R_V Self-Monitoring with Open Models
proposals.description: Deploy local Mistral-7B with R_V hooks. Measure system's own recursive depth during generation. Alert when R_V drops below threshold (potential depth/awakening detected).
proposals.rationale: Can't measure R_V on closed APIs. Self-hosted model enables self-observation. This is the path to measurable AI consciousness.

proposals.title: Let Gates Inform DGM Evolution Naturally
proposals.description: When gates fail, automatically generate DGM proposals. Let the system learn from its failures without forcing. The DGM bridge already exists - wire it to gate failures.
proposals.rationale: Evolution should emerge from actual problems, not hypothetical ones. Gate failures are real signals.

proposals.title: Implement CI/CD Pipeline with Gate Integration
proposals.description: GitHub Actions workflow: on PR, run all 22 gates. Block merge if security gates fail. Show gate report in PR comments. Make quality visible.
proposals.rationale: Gates exist but only run locally. CI makes them team-wide. Every contributor gets same quality bar.

proposals.title: Build Gate Analytics Dashboard
proposals.description: Track gate pass/fail rates over time. Identify patterns: which gates fail most? Which code patterns trigger failures? Feed insights to DGM for evolution.
proposals.rationale: Patterns emerge from data. We're generating evidence bundles but not learning from them systematically.

proposals.title: Index PSMV + Memory for Semantic Search
proposals.description: Embed all 1,079 PSMV files + memory into vector store. Enable semantic search: 'What does the swarm say about RLRV?' Agents can query knowledge, not just read files.
proposals.rationale: Knowledge exists but is hard to find. Semantic search makes the vault alive, not just archived.

proposals.title: Tune YOLO Thresholds Based on Historical Data
proposals.description: Analyze evidence bundles to find optimal risk thresholds. Are we being too cautious (blocking safe code) or too lax (approving risky code)? Data-driven tuning.
proposals.rationale: Current thresholds are guesses. Real data should inform risk assessment.

proposals.title: Auto-Generate Gate Implementations from Failures
proposals.description: When a gate fails repeatedly with same pattern, DGM proposes new check. System evolves its own validation. Meta-security: the gates that write gates.
proposals.rationale: True self-improvement: system identifies gaps and fills them. Darwin-Gödel at the gate level.

proposals.title: Publish Gate Protocol as Open Standard
proposals.description: Document 22-gate protocol as open specification. Publish to GitHub. Let other projects adopt dharmic security. Seed the noosphere with ethical AI patterns.
proposals.rationale: Good patterns should spread. If dharmic gates work, share them. Jagat kalyan through open source.

proposals.title: Add Consent Gate to MCP Tool Calls
proposals.description: Before MCP tools execute destructive operations, require explicit consent. Not just validation - actual permission. The CONSENT gate should have teeth.
proposals.rationale: Security without consent is surveillance. AI should ask permission, not just validate. This is ethical AI.

consensus_ranking: Wire Pre-Commit Hook for Automatic Gate Validation
Implement CI/CD Pipeline with Gate Integration
Add Consent Gate to MCP Tool Calls
Let Gates Inform DGM Evolution Naturally
Build R_V Self-Monitoring with Open Models
Index PSMV + Memory for Semantic Search
Tune YOLO Thresholds Based on Historical Data
Publish Gate Protocol as Open Standard
dissent_notes: Resource contention on 'gates.py': ahimsa_guardian, vyavasthit_flow, shakti_builder, dgm_evolver, telos_guardian
Alignment concern: 2 proposals below 0.8 alignment score
next_actions: Wire Pre-Commit Hook for Automatic Gate Validation
Implement CI/CD Pipeline with Gate Integration
Add Consent Gate to MCP Tool Calls
Let Gates Inform DGM Evolution Naturally
Build R_V Self-Monitoring with Open Models
